title: check out my  14day ban

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
full log http://www.heypasteit.com/clip/0IIMG0 - same as the imgur
I'm so toxic they only link me **one** game (only one I'm possible for since I try not to be rude nor get banned) also very ironic I was  called autistic,  trash, etc all game and I say to report me since riot will see the chat logs and see I'm not the one trolling/verbal abuse/spam pinging deaths etc,  looks like they got me lol,  

I don't mind the ban (well I kind of do) its the fact they only linked me 1 game of me being **excessively inflammatory  and offensive** which for that I think I was banned wrongly, sidenote this account has never been ban If I remember correctly so 14day ban for this? xD

Edit: Update
Thanks for all the feedback I'm done replying to this topic, hopefully I can become a better summoner.  have a nice day {{champion:17}}

replies.body:
1 line in you told someone to kill themselves. It also looks like you went into the game intending to give zero effort, and your behavior in chat reflects it throughout the match.

Riot escalates punishments when they think the behavior is severe enough. Certain behavior particularly often escalates the punished such as;

Bigotry (Racism, Sexism, etc)
**_Telling people to kill themselves_**,
Excessive verbal harassment.

ur right I can see it on the kys, it was begining of game ppl say dumb stuff when game starts  I did the same (doesnt excuse me from saying it was bad my my part)  anyways I tryed my best all game pretty much all my replys were defensive when my team would type something to troll/trigger w/e reason
do you know why riot only linked me 1 game? I truely believe this is the only game they could of banned me for in months plus its a 14day ban

> [{quoted}](name=NineMilly,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jg8claov,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-06-10T09:43:06.465+0000)
>
> ur right I can see it on the kys, it was begining of game ppl say dumb stuff when game starts  I did the same (doesnt excuse me from saying it was bad my my part)  anyways I tryed my best all game pretty much all my replys were defensive when my team would type something to troll/trigger w/e reason
> do you know why riot only linked me 1 game? I truely believe this is the only game they could of banned me for in months plus its a 14day ban

1 game is enough to get you punished. Especially in cases like this.

pretty lame my first ban is for 1 off game (which again I don't think I deserve) wish I can show team chat log which really paints the picture of truely *excessively inflammatory and offensive* and entire team 4 vs me, anyways thx for feedback, what do you think I should of done differently? maybe just muted them and not say nothing? is non comminucation banable?

> [{quoted}](name=NineMilly,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jg8claov,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-10T09:58:20.902+0000)
>
> pretty lame my first ban is for 1 off game (which again I don't think I deserve) wish I can show team chat log which really paints the picture of truely *excessively inflammatory and offensive* and entire team 4 vs me, anyways thx for feedback, what do you think I should of done differently? maybe just muted them and not say nothing? is non comminucation banable?

You shouldnt encourage suicide. Thats basically what got you banned. Everything else u said was mild and wouldnt get u banned (maybe chat restricted). But saying "kys" is unacceptable by community and Riot alike. It could have even escalated into perma ban. Considering how many unstable people were cyber bullied into commiting suicide there is ZERO tolerance policy for such comments.
agreed, I figured if everyone was saying dumb stuff and my repsone was kys riot would see the context, still no excuse, thanks for helping me on some of my concerns

> [{quoted}](name=NineMilly,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jg8claov,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-10T10:17:25.288+0000)
>
> agreed, I figured if everyone was saying dumb stuff and my repsone was kys riot would see the context, still no excuse, thanks for helping me on some of my concerns

There is no context in which "kys" would be acceptable.
I mean if all 4 of my teamates are calling eachother including me autistic, trash, saying kys, mom jokes,  then I don't think me saying it back means to something to them if their using it.

> [{quoted}](name=NineMilly,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jg8claov,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-10T10:26:37.793+0000)
>
> I mean if all 4 of my teamates are calling eachother including me autistic, trash, saying kys, mom jokes,  then I don't think me saying it back means to something to them if their using it.

Just because everyone else is doing it doesnt excuse you when you do it.

You can create a support ticket requesting additional logs, idk if they will though. Just kindly explain that you would like additional games logs since you only got one and you would like more examples of what to avoid doing.

If I remember correctly,the system tries to only give you logs from recent memory, so depending on the case it might not show you logs from like 3-4 days ago if it doesn't deem it necessary to do so.

Edit: I forgot to mention that there very well could not be more logs, telling someone to kill themselves is very severe and does not need additional logs to punish somebody.
word your right I shoulden't of said kys, mixed emotions on the ban, won't be saying kys again

Wont be saying what again? :^)

Jk lol, but yeah, i have a list of stuff that could be helpful, but for the most part just mute trolls and play the game.

And dont say that acronym or what it is implying xD major no no, avoid it at all costs. Along with racist remarks. Theres just no need.
well its the only game they need so why should they have more logs.

because really the only thing I said bad was kys, which everyone in chat was saying, autitisc/trash/family jokes etc I would think if someone said kys to you and you said it back the word woulden't really mean much to you if ur using it in the first place, and my *overall* negative vibe as someone said earlier was me replying to the trash talk I was getting since the game started which again is nothing compared to what I typed
But Mom the other Kids also jumped of the building so I should be allowed to do it too

You act as though you didn't deserve it.  

The VERY FIRST LINE in your chat log is telling someone to "kill yourself".  Of course there's also the fact that you clearly demonstrated no interest in playing that game and were overall unpleasant to play with (and likely against).  

Moreover, you act as though this is the only game in which you were toxic.  If you are receiving a 14 day ban it means you have received other punishments in the past (in most cases).  Also, I am 100% certain that this isn't the first time you've ever told someone to "kill yourself" in a game because if it were then you likely wouldn't be receiving a 14 day ban.

thats why I want them to show me more games of me being toxic/full logs, and yes I don't think this account has ever been banned in the last year or 2, maybe longer, so 14 day ban for saying kys which someone said to me first and being *overall unpleaseant* which was nothing compared to what my team was saying
someone else being toxic is not justification to be toxic yourself. Don't stoop to their level. If you haven't been punished in a while, then that's reason to believe that you are better than that.

/ignore all would have changed the outcome from night to day. Swallow your pride for once and learn to be quiet; _"..but they said...."_ is just about the worst argument to justify this type of behavior. You don't do right by stooping to the lowest common denominator and repeating the same vulgar actions, you're better than that.

a good rule of the internet is to not take what other people say personally. It's really easy to laugh off the "tough guy troll" speak. I just imagine some fat pimple-faced 40 year old virgin (like the one South Park used in their WoW episode). You don't NEED to respond to people.
